TutorialScript.TutorialStep: It's Thursday, and Simon always hits up the corner store on his way home from school for brain food (carrots and Cheeseytoos).
But today he's lost his appetite. The Prom is only one day away!!
As usual, some of the popular girls are hanging around outside. Naomi's the only one of them who's ever been nice to him. Maybe he can use that leverage to impress the others?
Monica's the queen bee of the school, shrewd and cunning, and has never given him the time of day... is she destined to be Simon's rival, or could he sway her to the geek side??
And then there's Monica's best friend Cassandra... super popular, but not the brightest bulb in the sky. Could Simon use that to his advantage?
Now it's your turn to do some social networking. Will Simon increase his friends count... or maybe something more?
